cves.description: EPSON WebConfig and Epson Web Control for SEIKO EPSON Projector Products do not restrict excessive authentication attempts. An administrative user's password may be identified through a brute force attack.

affected.product: EPSON WebConfig for SEIKO EPSON Projector Products

versions.version: see the information provided by the vendor

versions.version: see the information provided by the vendor

problemType: Improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts
